item.title: How to Source Openrc with Zsh
item.description: Create file openrc_zsh with content: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 #!/bin/env bash function sourceopenrc { pushd ~/devstack >/dev/null eval $(bash -c ". openrc $1$2;env|sed -n '/OS_/ { s/^/export /;p}'") popd >/dev/null } sourceopenrc admin admin Run source openrc_zsh.
